mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_title,qna_question, qna_date,qna_count,user_id) values (#{qnaTitle},#{qnaQuestion}, sysdate,0,#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from qna q join users u on u.user_id = q.user_id order by qna_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from qna q join users u on u.user_id = q.user_id where qna_title like #{qnaTitle} order by qna_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from qna q join answer a on a.qna_no = q.qna_no where qna_question like #{qnaQuestion} or answer_content like #{qnaQuestion} order by q.qna_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from qna q join users u on u.user_id = q.user_id where user_nick like #{userNick} order by qna_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10
mapper.update: update qna set qna_count= (select qna_count from qna where qna_no=#{qnaNo})+1 where qna_no = #{qnaNo}
